hero.title: Putting Transparency to the Test
hero.description: We study Freedom of Information laws through field experiments and citizen science. Our research measures the gap between formal adoption of transparency legislation and its real-world implementation across countries and institutions.

researchCards.title: TRANSACT
researchCards.description: Our flagship field experiment testing FOI responsiveness across all 581 Belgian municipalities, using five randomised requester profiles and citizen science methodology.

researchCards.title: Transparencia.be Analysis
researchCards.description: Computational text analysis of 4,266 citizen FOI requests from Belgium’s national transparency platform, using topic modeling, sentiment analysis, and multinomial regression.

researchCards.title: International Expansion
researchCards.description: Extending TRANSACT methodology to Switzerland, Romania, South Africa, and Uganda — building comparative evidence on FOI implementation across legal frameworks.
